file_content.text: Great. I get to listen to him try to rhyme words with "defensive turret" for the rest of the day.
You're back! Talk to this Voss, would you? He's acting as if the world were about to end.
Please let him know when the tombs are clear. He's going to be a pain until you return, I just know it.
Hold that thought.
Welcome to camp... eh, come to think of it, I don't know the name of this dump.
How may I help you fine people? Preferably over there somewhere.
Is there something I can do for you, my lord? I'm sure you need an errand run... or something.
Hunter! I'm sure you need... directions or munitions... or something, right? Let's talk over there.
Fantastic! A fellow Imperial! I'm sure we have lots to talk about. Somewhere else.
So, why don't I give you the tour? Starting... I don't know, away from here.
Sergeant! We are not done!
Here we go again.
You must help! Why else are outsiders here?
Ugh. Help me out, would you? He's some kind of artist, and he's flaky as a pastry. Get this Voss off my back?
You will do your job, Sergeant. The Empire does not tolerate incompetence.
Help the Voss. [Choke him]
I... I'm sorry, my lord. Please!
If you won't do what he asks, I'll make room for someone who will.
No. [Shock him.]
I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Stop!
I'm not your buddy. Do your job, or the Empire winds up short a sergeant.
No. Quit being lazy. [Hit him]
You're tarnishing the Empire's good name, Sergeant.
No. [Hit him.]
Of--of course.
A Voss in hysterics? Take it somewhere else.
Disgusting. Get lost, Voss.
I will not! The Shrine of Healing is in danger!
Why is he upset?
Gormak have taken the ruins! They defile the dead! They dig from the tombs toward the shrine!
You claim to be allies, you refuse to help!
It would take weeks for me to get clearance for a mission to the tombs.
The Voss have commandos all over this area. They don't need our help.
This is the Empire: useless. The Republic will make better allies.
Calm down. I'll go into the tombs and stop their tunneling.
I'll stop the Gormak.
You are a light from the stars!
There has to be something useful you can do, Sergeant.
You heard him. Go help.
Where are the commandos?
The commandos fight already!
I don't have the manpower to attack the tombs.
You... couldn't look into this, could you? I'm sure the Empire would be grateful....
I want all the details: how many Gormak are in there, the defenses, everything.
Tell me about the tombs.
Ruins teem with Gormak. Turrets ring the perimeter.
Below, great machines claw toward the Shrine of Healing. Destroy these. Voss will be eternally grateful.
Very well.
Thank you! You're a lifesaver!
I'm not feeling charitable enough to bail you out, Sergeant. Cope with this yourself.
Not my problem. [Refuse quest]
The Three will know of this!
Look, I've got my hands full right now. Come back later.
